content.text:
# Draft:Panas Dingin Awards

The annual Panas Dingin Awards is an Indonesian comedy awards television program on Trans 7. The program is parodies award the annual Panasonic Gobel Awards from Panasonic and Rachmad Gobel by Opera Van Java.
History
Starting in 2011, OVJ appeared in different designs, namely Panas DIngin Awards. It is served as the parody of Panasonic Gobel Awards by Panasonic and Rachmad Gobel. The reason of this parody is the Trans Corp (the sole owner of Trans 7) have felt cheated by MNC (owner of RCTI, the official broadcaster of the real awards for many consecutive years) because it was considered not fair in determining the winners.

2014
Held for the fourth time on April 19, 2014, at Mahaka Sportsmall, Kelapa Gading, Jakarta withn Ayu Hastari and Addry Danu as hosts. Previously, the Red Carpet procession was carried out by Natalie Sarah and Jeremy Teti. And attended by Maia Estimasi, Ahmad Daging, Syahroni, Elvis Presyley, Raden Kain Rantang and Captain America

2016
The 2016 Panas Dingin Awards (presented as The 91st Panas Dingin Awards) was the fifth edition of the Panas Dingin Awards''', held on October 25, 2016. Unlike previous Panas Dingin Awards, this year's awards were part of the Opera Van Java series in general. This award was also the first after Opera Van Java went on hiatus in 2015.
Host: Jeremy Teti
